articles.title: Everything to know ahead of Thursday's opening of the 2026 international signing period - MLB.com
articles.description:
There is no day on the international baseball calendar quite like Jan. 15 -- it’s the Super Bowl, a Taylor Swift concert and New Year’s celebration all rolled into one.

articles.title: Anthony Davis is not expected to need surgery on his hand - NBA
articles.description: Anthony Davis (hand) will be sidelined about 6 weeks, but the 10-time All-Star won’t need surgery to repair ligament damage.

Yanks, seeking pitching, deal for Marlins' Weathers - ESPN
articles.description: The Yankees, in pursuit of starting pitching, acquired young left-hander Ryan Weathers from the Marlins for a package of four prospects on Tuesday.

articles.description: Lamar Jackson’s salary cap hit is slated to be $74.5 million in 2026 and 2027.

articles.title: More horsepower, new faces as North Wilkesboro test brings offseason rumble - NASCAR.com
articles.description: Fifteen teams hit the track Tuesday at North Wilkesboro Speedway for an offseason test with the new 750-horsepower rules configuration.

articles.description: The Eagles signed TE E.J. Jenkins, T John Ojukwu, and RB Carson Steele to future contracts.

articles.title: Patriots Make Changes to the Practice Squad - New England Patriots
articles.description: The Patriots announced that CB Miles Battle, RB D'Ernest Johnson, T Lorenz Metz and WR Trent Sherfield Sr. have been signed to the practice squad and DL Fabien Lovett and WR Brandon Smith have been released from the practice squad.

articles.title: Vikings HC Kevin O'Connell looks to add depth, competition to QB room during 2026 offseason - NFL.com
articles.description: Minnesota Vikings head coach Kevin O’Connell told reporters on Tuesday that he wants a deeper quarterback room for the 2026 season.

articles.description: The Los Angeles Chargers today signed the following 14 players to Reserve/Future free agent contracts. 11 of the players finished the 2025 season on the team’s practice squad

articles.title: Alum gifts $17.3M to UCLA football, men's hoops - ESPN
articles.description: Late UCLA alum Lawrence Layne (MBA Class of 1977) has gifted $17.3 million to the Bruins' football and men's basketball programs as part of an over $40 million pledge to multiple areas of the university.

articles.title: QB Dampier announces return to Utah for '26 - ESPN
articles.description: Utah quarterback Devon Dampier will return for the 2026 season, the Big 12 Offensive Newcomer of the Year announced Tuesday.

articles.title: Eagles make change at offensive coordinator - Philadelphia Eagles
articles.description: Head Coach Nick Sirianni met with Kevin Patullo on Tuesday to inform him of the decision.
